name: Hyper Neon Pinball
description:
Hyper Neon Pinball! 

A pinball game that pits you and a friend on a single device to gather as many points before the time runs out and to use the skills you collect to make things crazy!

In this adversarial physics game are 3 levels which start off easy and end up getting more chaotic as you play.

Three abilities to master and figure out your best timing to use your skills.

-Fireball: depending on where the gravity to the ball is will launch it towards your opponents or your goal.

-Multiball: It's time to split! making the ball split means more and quicker way to earn points, but can you keep up with all the madness on screen?

-Heavyball: Makes a ball harder to control for a set period of time, perfect for using against your foe.

Made by Anthony Brame & Shane Stephenson

**(NOTE)** 

This game is free, all we ask is if you enjoy it share it around, tell friends and family about the game, challenge partners and compete against peers!

This helps us know if the game is good, and what we need to do more of in future!
